item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: News
item.description: 2020 class="tg-s268" width="20%"6-Nov class="tg-s268"Get back to the PhD study after completing my internship with Amazon Lex Team. 15-Oct Our paper LNMap is accepted in EMNLP-2020. 03-Aug I will be starting my internship at Amazon, with Lex Team. 28-Aug Passed my PhD Qualifying Examination (QE). 28-Apr Preprint of our new paper LNMap released in Arxiv. 24-Apr Preprint of our new paper MultiMix released in Arxiv.

item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website or blog in under 10 minutes.
